description.en: RiveX is an interoperable and scalable layer-2 on-chain and off-chain solution primarily on Wanchain and side chains on other public chains which Wanchain has cross-chained with. RiveX aims to combine the strength and virtues of both public chains and side chains to empower the next generation of decentralized applications, enterprise solutions and decentralized finance. RiveX has its very own APIs & SDKs to allow developers to build on RiveX and also allows the ease of integration for any enterprises and applications to be integrated into RiveX’s infrastructure.
